card.name: CW - CCWE30 - Admin verify the query before returned to bureau

data.text: @lungisaximbi @jakovanrensburg @neilbosworth Unfortunately Gordon and Anthony dont specify if a log is related to another and should be linked. They create it seperately and there's no way I'd know if it's linked. So I would've created a new log regarding their findings. This however is obviously not complete as they haven't tested thoroughly or havent advised me that testing is complete.
